Proposal Classes for Use in Catalogs¶

CONTACT Projects supports the ce_admin_en:catalog_proposals_standard of the CONTACT Elements Platform for the following business objects:

Proposal Classes for Use in Catalogs¶
Business Object Name of the proposal class
Project pcs_project_proposals
Project Template pcs_project_template_proposals
Task pcs_task_proposals

If you are developing an application or customizing an installation, we strongly recommend that you use these proposal classes in your catalogs.
